about_the_game:
Discover The Greenhouse: A Glimpse Into the Mystery!

Step into the world of The Greenhouse with this demo, offering a sneak peek at the captivating liminal spaces, intriguing puzzles, and subtle storytelling that define the entire game. Unravel the greenhouse's enigmatic tale by uncovering hidden clues and hints.

Explore

Dive into stunning botanical gardens and modern architecture brought to life with responsive physics and dynamic lighting. Traverse deep water and dense foliage, where every step feels grounded and real. As you journey through every corner, snapshots are automatically added to your photo album, helping you track the areas you’ve explored.

Interact

Engage with objects to awaken your sixth sense, uncovering memories and clues left behind by past visitors. Some objects are connected to nature, granting you the power to control the weather. Seamlessly shift between rain and sunshine, dramatically altering the atmosphere around you.

Choose Your Challenge: Walk or Survive

By default, the game offers a serene walking simulator experience through eerie liminal spaces. For a heart-pounding twist, activate Entities to intensify the gameplay. Ghosts, insects, and the Groundskeeper can each be enabled individually, bringing unique threats. Arm yourself with bug spray to ward off deadly insects, and if you encounter the Groundskeeper, run for your life!

Escape

Once a vibrant attraction, this amusement park's unnerving modern art and lush botanical glasshouses now form a labyrinth of corridors, art galleries, and gardens. Lose yourself in its twists and turns, but don’t forget to strategically pick up and drop objects to mark your path and find your way to freedom.

Save your Journey

Save and load your progress whenever you need, with the game automatically capturing your milestones at key checkpoints.

Stay Tuned: Thrills, Chills, and New Adventures Await!

Get ready to encounter deadly red ghosts, solve mind-bending perspective-based puzzles, and explore breathtaking new liminal spaces, including lush green pavilions.

name: Greenhouse Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or later)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 (from 2017 or later)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or later)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 (from 2019 or later)
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM

short_description: Explore the eerie galleries and botanical spaces of the Greenhouse. Piece together the mystery. Interact with optical art, illusions and weather effects. Turn on entities if you dare.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
